thread.title: Security camera footage shows Siberian shopping mall fire

title: Security camera footage shows Siberian shopping mall fire
text:
Security camera footage shows Siberian shopping mall fire 4:02pm BST - 00:58 
Children can be seen rushing out of a playroom in recently released security camera footage from inside the Siberian mall where a fire killed 64 people. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Children can be seen rushing out of a playroom in recently released security camera footage from inside the Siberian mall where a fire killed 64 people. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2Jh9VwT
